string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Rat: 2008, 1996, 1984, 1972, 1960. Intelligent, adaptable, quick-witted, charming, artistic, sociable. Compatible with Ox, Dragon, or Rabbit.
Ox: 2009, 1997, 1985, 1973, 1961. Loyal, reliable, thorough, strong, reasonable, steady, determined. Compatible with Rat, Monkey, or Rooster.
Tiger: 2010, 1998, 1986, 1974, 1962. Enthusiastic, courageous, ambitious, leadership, confidence, charismatic. Compatible with Dragon, Horse, or Pig.
Rabbit: 2011, 1999, 1987, 1975, 1963. Trustworthy, empathic, modest, diplomatic, sincere, sociable, caretakers. Compatible with Rat, Goat, Monkey, or Dog.
Dragon: 2012, 2000, 1988, 1976, 1964. Lucky, flexible, eccentric, imaginative, artistic, spiritual, charismatic. Compatible with Rat, Tiger or Snake.
Snake: 2013, 2001, 1989, 1977, 1965. Philosophical, organized, intelligent, intuitive, elegant, attentive, decisive. Compatible with Dragon or Rooster.
Horse: 2014, 2002, 1990, 1978, 1966. Adaptable, loyal, courageous, ambitious, intelligent, adventurous, strong. Compatible with Goat or Tiger.
Goat: 2015, 2003, 1991, 1979, 1967. Tasteful, crafty, warm, elegant, charming, intuitive, sensitive, calm. Compatible with Rabbit, Horse or Pig.
Monkey: 2016, 2004, 1992, 1980, 1968. Quick-witted, charming, lucky, adaptable, bright, versatile, lively, smart. Compatible with Ox or Rabbit.
Rooster: 2017, 2005, 1993, 1981, 1969. Honest, energetic, intelligent, flamboyant, flexible, diverse, confident. Compatible with Ox or Snake.
Dog: 2018, 2006, 1994, 1982, 1970. Loyal, sociable, courageous, diligent, steady, lively, adaptable, smart. Compatible with Rabbit.
Pig: 2019, 2007, 1995, 1983, 1971. Honorable, philanthropic, determined, optimistic, sincere, sociable. Compatible with Goat, Tiger, or Rabbit.
